name: part_006
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2024】Shirogane Noel Xmas 3D LIVE 【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [fTupWAFy6wo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel, Nekomata Okayu, and Inugami Korone perform the song 'Suteki na Holiday'.
Shirogane Noel, AZKi, and Amane Kanata perform the song 'IN MY DREAM'.

subtitles.original: 抱かれたテディベアも　もう待ちきれない
subtitles.english: Even the teddy bear being hugged can't wait anymore

subtitles.original: クリスマスが今年もやって来る
subtitles.english: Christmas is coming again this year

subtitles.original: 悲しかった出来事を　消し去るように
subtitles.english: As if to erase the sad events

subtitles.original: さあ　パジャマを脱いだら　出かけよう
subtitles.english: Come on, once you've taken off your pajamas, let's go out

subtitles.original: 少しずつ白くなる　街路樹を駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Run through the street trees that are gradually turning white

subtitles.original: 華やぎ始めた　街は急ぎ足
subtitles.english: The town has begun to brighten up, everyone is in a hurry

subtitles.original: 贈り物決まる頃　黄昏れていく
subtitles.english: By the time the gifts are decided, twilight is falling

subtitles.original: かじかんだ指を　ママが温めるね
subtitles.english: Mom will warm your frozen fingers

subtitles.original:
Happy holidays, happy holidays
What a glorious time of year
subtitles.english:
Happy holidays, happy holidays
What a glorious time of year

subtitles.original: 大切なものは　みんなそばにある
subtitles.english: Everything important is right by your side

subtitles.original: 穏やかな毎日が　続くぜいたく
subtitles.english: The luxury of peaceful days continuing

subtitles.original: クリスマスがもうじきやって来る
subtitles.english: Christmas will be here very soon

subtitles.original: うれしさをかくせない　犬や猫まで
subtitles.english: Even dogs and cats can't hide their joy

subtitles.original: もみの木に灯る　明かりをうけて
subtitles.english: In the light of the fir tree

subtitles.original: いつもよりやさしそうな　パパの目が笑ってる
subtitles.english: Dad's eyes, looking kinder than usual, are smiling

subtitles.original: クリスマスは誰にでもやって来る
subtitles.english: Christmas comes to everyone

subtitles.original: もしひとりぼっちでも　淋しがらずに
subtitles.english: Even if you're all alone, don't be lonely

subtitles.original: 心に住むサンタに呼びかけて
subtitles.english: Call out to the Santa living in your heart

subtitles.original: 幼い頃の夢を　思い出してごらんよ
subtitles.english: Try to remember your childhood dreams

subtitles.original: クリスマスが今年もやって来る
subtitles.english: Christmas is coming again this year

subtitles.original: 悲しかった出来事を　消し去るように
subtitles.english: As if to erase the sad events

subtitles.original: さあ　パジャマを脱いだら　出かけよう
subtitles.english: Come on, once you've taken off your pajamas, let's go out

subtitles.original: 少しずつ白くなる　街路樹を駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Run through the street trees that are gradually turning white

subtitles.original: Happy happy holidays
subtitles.english: Happy happy holidays

subtitles.original:
IN MY DREAM
作詞・作曲：真行寺 恵里
subtitles.english:
IN MY DREAM
Lyrics & Composition: Eri Shingyoji

subtitles.original: Nightmare　あなたは夢に　勝手に入り込んで
subtitles.english: Nightmare, you enter my dreams without permission

subtitles.original: 気が狂いそうなほど　夢中にさせて
subtitles.english: Making me so infatuated it feels like I'm going crazy

subtitles.original: 消えてゆくのに
subtitles.english: Even though you fade away

subtitles.original: 芝生に寝転ぶ彼　まるで別人なの
subtitles.english: He's lying on the grass, looking like a completely different person

subtitles.original: 挑発されたい　刺激的に情熱的にね
subtitles.english: I want to be provoked, excitingly and passionately

subtitles.original: In My Dream　赤い薔薇の花
subtitles.english: In My Dream, red roses

subtitles.original: 部屋中にいっぱい　敷きつめて
subtitles.english: Fill the whole room with them

subtitles.original: シルクのベッドで　愛し合おう朝まで
subtitles.english: Let's make love on a silk bed until morning

subtitles.original: I can't get enough your love
subtitles.english: I can't get enough your love

subtitles.original: In My Dream　目覚めさせないで
subtitles.english: In My Dream, don't wake me up

subtitles.original: 邪魔はさせない　誰にも
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in the way

subtitles.original: 耳元でいつも　エンドレステープのように
subtitles.english: Always by my ear, like an endless tape

subtitles.original: 囁いていて　Love me Forever
subtitles.english: Whisper to me, Love me Forever

subtitles.original: Day Dream　何度誘っても
subtitles.english: Day Dream, no matter how many times I invite you
